mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user (open_id, username, user_password, phone_number, email, login_type, login_ip, login_count, user_status, register_time) values (#{openId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update user set open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=CHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_password = #{userPassword,jdbcType=CHAR}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_type = #{loginType,jdbcType=CHAR}, login_ip = #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_count = #{loginCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, register_time = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, open_id, username, user_password, phone_number, email, login_type, login_ip, login_count, user_status, register_time from user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, open_id, username, phone_number, email, login_type, login_ip, login_count, user_status, register_time from user
